No. 09-8044. Loyd Landon Sorrow, Petitioner v. Rick Thaler, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. 560 U.S. 919, 130 S. Ct. 3314,

176 L. Ed. 2d 1212,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 4156. May 17, 2010.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 559 U.S. 948, 130 S. Ct. 1529, 176 L. Ed. 2d 129, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 1424.
